Achievements.Description: Complete the Carrier Monkey event within 5 minutes or less. (But you're still punished, Bad Monkey!)
Achievements.Author: blendedsea

Achievements.Title: Presents for a Monkey
Achievements.Description: Open all available Chapter 3 Present Boxes. [19]
Achievements.Author: blendedsea

Achievements.Title: Come Together, Right Now, Over Me
Achievements.Description: Defeat the Jealous Bass with a combined party level of 35 or less.
Achievements.Author: blendedsea

Achievements.Title: Presents from a Modern Era
Achievements.Description: Open all available Chapter 4 Present Boxes. [25]

Achievements.Title: Strictly in a Friend Sense!
Achievements.Description: Obtain a Secret Herb from a Pigmask.
Achievements.Author: blendedsea

Achievements.Title: You Hooligans!
Achievements.Description: Add Soup to a sign.
Achievements.Author: blendedsea

Achievements.Title: Number 1 Fan of Physically Beating You
Achievements.Description: Defeat the Fierce Pork Trooper in Thunder Tower without spending any PP.
Achievements.Author: blendedsea

Achievements.Title: Overcharged
Achievements.Description: Defeat Mr. Genetor while no one has any Rubber items equipped.

Achievements.Title: Presents from a Tower
Achievements.Description: Open all available Chapter 5 Present Boxes. [18]

Achievements.Title: Green, Green
Achievements.Description: Experience the joy of riding a green-colored train. [3+ Party]

Achievements.Description: Allow Salsa to grab some out of reach items for you in the Chimera Lab.

Achievements.Title: Very Little Was Accomplished!
Achievements.Description: Choose both of the wrong Chimera for the water switching task.

Achievements.Title: Give Thanks to You?
Achievements.Description: Obtain the Silver Dragonfly gift from a Mr. Saturn

Achievements.Description: Defeat the Steel Mechorilla atop the Snowy Mountains.

Achievements.Title: The Fire Volcano
Achievements.Description: Pull the Needle in the depths of the Fire Mountain.

Achievements.Title: Hey King, You Dropped This
Achievements.Description: Obtain the Awesome Crown from the Sea Floor Dungeon.

Achievements.Title: My Home!
Achievements.Description: Return the Hermit Crab Shell to the Hermit Crab.

Achievements.Description: Defeat Master Eddy with no weapons equipped.

Achievements.Title: Whoa! We Really Did Stumble!
Achievements.Description: Obtain the 4 other items in Argilla Pass.

Achievements.Title: Presents from the Magypsies
Achievements.Description: Open all available Chapter 7 Present Boxes. [49]

Achievements.Description: Obtain the Canine Weapon.

Achievements.Title: Inflate Your Balloon, Not Your Ego!
Achievements.Description: Complete the Balloon Popping game before Porky Bot reaches the second balloon size.

Achievements.Title: I Wondered Where I Left That
Achievements.Description: Interact with the Doorknob.

Achievements.Title: Presents from a Big City
Achievements.Description: Open all available Chapter 8 Present Boxes. [25]

Achievements.Title: I Can Fix that Dang Door Now
Achievements.Description: Picked up the Doorknob.
Achievements.Author: blendedsea

Achievements.Title: Alternative Encounter Expert
Achievements.Description: Encounter all alternative sprite of every possible enemy in the game. (Note, not all have an alt)

Achievements.Title: The Perfect Classic Conflict
Achievements.Description: Defeat Bowser at Peach's Castle without taking damage!

Achievements.Description: Help Toads and Koopas before boarding the Koopa Cruiser!
